## Checklist

<!-- Go through this checklist before requesting a review. Be honest. -->

- [ ] My code builds without errors (`yarn build`)
- [ ] I have run the linter (`yarn lint`)
- [ ] I have run the type checker (`yarn type-check`)
- [ ] I have tested on desktop viewport
- [ ] I have tested on mobile viewport
- [ ] I have not committed any `console.log` statements
- [ ] I have not committed any hardcoded secrets or API keys
- [ ] My branch is up to date with `main`
- [ ] I have written a clear PR description (you are reading it, so hopefully yes)
